title: New EKS Access Management and Pod Identity features: a security analysis
summary: The Wiz research team unpacks the security implications of the new EKS access and identity management features and recommends best practices when using them.

title: Critical Vulnerabilities in Ivanti Exploited in-the-Wild: everything you need to know
summary: Detect and mitigate CVE-2023-46805, CVE-2024-21887, CVE-2024-21888 and CVE-2024-21893, critical vulnerabilities in Ivanti VPN products.
